EmailTemplate.name: 201809_Americas_Webinar_GoDirect_mih.201809_Americas_Invite2_Webinar_GoDirect_mi
EmailTemplate.subject: Sign up Today! Free Webcast - GoDirect™ Jet ConneX Service Plans
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Our upcoming webcast, GoDirect™ Jet ConneX Service Plans, is only one week away! Here are the key topics:
- Global coverage provided by Jet ConneX
- Data consumption statistics - Manage cost with JX plans that fit your connectivity goals
- GoDirect mobile application and customer portal - Introduction of the new GoDirect Routers - End-to-end support provided by Honeywell global support team
Join our webcast Wednesday, October 10 at 8:00 a.m. PT / 11:00 a.m. ET to see for yourself how you can get revolutionary in-flight Wi-Fi for office and home-like connectivity in the sky.
REGISTER NOW <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/GoDirect_Webinar.html]]>
